channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek Hangout – Episode 7 – App Discovery, iOS6 Adoption, and Gotta Feed Garp!

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: Be sure to check out Brian's new tutorial on accessing data via JSON using the Corona SDK, http://www.burtonsmediagroup.com/blog/2012/11/how-to-download-json-data-from-mysql-using-corona-sdk/
item.content:encoded: Be sure to check out Brian’s new tutorial on accessing data via JSON using the Corona SDK, http://www.burtonsmediagroup.com/blog/2012/11/how-to-download-json-data-from-mysql-using-corona-sdk/
